name: Abort This
description:
You are the aborted fetus hunter! With your army of 5 zombie fetuses, fight through waves of aborted babies! Your only weapon is a zombie fetus launcher! Make sure to pick up your 5 zombie fetuses, otherwise you can't win the fight.

Controls: W A S D SPACE and MOUSE

The AI was more broken before - I swear!

Game by http://hubertkaluzny.com

Art by Matthew Seredyn
